name: URigVMLink
doc:
The Link represents a connection between two Pins
within a Graph. The Link can be accessed on the
Graph itself - or through the URigVMPin::GetLinks()
method.

methods.name: GetGraphDepth
methods.doc: Returns the graph nesting depth of this link

methods.name: GetLinkIndex
methods.doc: Returns the current index of this Link within its owning Graph.

methods.name: GetOppositePin
methods.doc: Returns the opposite Pin of this Link given one of its edges (or nullptr)

methods.name: GetPinPathRepresentation
methods.doc:
Returns a string representation of the Link,
for example: "NodeA.Color.R -> NodeB.Translation.X"
note: can be split again using SplitPinPathRepresentation

methods.name: GetSourceNode
methods.doc: Returns the source Node of this Link (or nullptr)

methods.name: GetSourcePin
methods.doc: Returns the source Pin of this Link (or nullptr)

methods.name: GetTargetNode
methods.doc: Returns the target Node of this Link (or nullptr)

methods.name: GetTargetPin
methods.doc: Returns the target Pin of this Link (or nullptr)
